synopsis.text:
Garderobe's elite Otome, Arika Yumemiya, finds herself in a new battle, a year after restoring peace among the nations. After narrowly averting a catastrophic meteor collision with Windbloom Kingdom, a formidable dark force emerges, accompanied by an enigmatic, black-robed figure. These mysterious adversaries possess the power to overthrow even the strongest Meisters, plunging the world into chaos once more.

As the nations convene for the Strategic Otome Limitation Talks, the sudden appearance of these powerful foes threatens the fragile peace. Meanwhile, Queen Mashiro vanishes following a disagreement with Arika, further complicating matters.

With the Blue Sky Sapphire's power wavering due to Arika and Mashiro's strained relationship, the young Otome embarks on a mission to find her friend. As Arika searches for Mashiro, Garderobe seeks answers to the mysterious attacks on their fellow Otomes. Can Arika overcome her personal struggles and harness the Blue Sky Sapphire's power to save her kingdom once again? Only time will tell as this thrilling new chapter unfolds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
